New Records: Yainer Diaz became the seventh player in Astros history to hit 20 home runs in their first full season
Key Match Events: Yainer Diaz hit a two-run home run in the fourth inning against the New York Yankees
Pre-Game Insights: Manager Dusty Baker is hellbent on playing his best defensive alignment behind Verlander and Valdez, which often does not include Diaz
Post-Match Reflections: Diaz expressed his goal of his parents for him to hit 20 homers, and he is staying positive despite uncertainty in the lineup
Miscellaneous Highlights: Diaz has started 39 of Houston's 54 games since July 1 and has shown signs of growth in his swing and chase rate
